mapper.select: SELECT c.commentId, c.userId, c.postId, c.content, c.createdAt, c.updatedAt, u.nickname, u.profileImg FROM comment as c JOIN user as u ON c.userId = u.userId WHERE c.postId=#{postId} ORDER BY c.updatedAt LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
select c.commentId, c.postId, c.userId, c.content, c.createdAt, c.email, c.nickname FROM comment as c JOIN user as u ON p.userId = u.userId WHERE p.postId=#{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(postId, userId, content) VALUES (#{comment.postId}, #{comment.userId}, #{comment.content});
